scripts.say: Comrade, welcome to the Intelligence Division of the Northern Parliament! Hehe, it's a super fun place to be!
Actually, this is where we decrypt all the intel you've collected. We send the results straight to the top brass.
In short, the more intelligence points you collect, the more rewards you'll be able to earn!
Come on, let's hurry up and get to work! If you need any more help, tap the "Help" button for a more detailed explanation!
